dependsOn.activity: Create Piped Copy of Data File

activities.name: Create Piped Copy of Data File

properties.description: Takes parquet data file and the delta lake.
Load transactions in data file into the stage table.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
;
WITH trans
AS
(
SELECT
	ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY trans_date ORDER BY(SELECT NULL)) AS trans_number
	,trans_id
    ,trans_date

FROM 
	bank.stage_transactions
)
UPDATE trans
SET trans_id = REPLACE( CAST(trans_date AS VARCHAR), '-', '') + CAST(trans_number AS VARCHAR)
;

SELECT * FROM bank.stage_transactions;

properties.description: Copy text data files from stage area into the raw area converted to parquet.
